the following story is based on a

was 13 years old I lived in a small

actually was something that I wanted for

just the books I loved to read after all
one of my favorite things to do was go

tucked my copy of where the Red Fern
Grows under my arm and walked to my spot
I was lost in my book for maybe 15

it led me to the river standing by the
water was the most beautiful and

sparkling black eyes toward me and I
felt compelled to go close
sir I know it sounds strange but 12 year

but I felt it inside me it was so weird
I continued to approach the Magnificent

I told my family about the horse that I

what do you think it was doing out there
